'''Tecoma''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|"Collective of Plenty"}}. He can be found instructing [[Chayohtli]] at the [[Training Ground (Point of Interest)|Training Ground]].

==Idle Quotes==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{DIcon|Idle}} Muscles!
::{{A|VO Tecoma 01.ogg}} "Muscles don't grow by sitting around!"
{{Dialogue End}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Tecoma:''' Okay! Let's keep it flowing &mdash; one more set! Muscles don't grow by sitting around!
:'''Chayohtli:''' Yes, Coach!
:'''Tecoma:''' That's it! Focus on your form! I want every rep to look like that! Muscles will reward you, muscles will appreciate you, and muscles will carry this tribe to greatness!
:'''Chayohtli:''' M&mdash;Muscles!
:'''Tecoma:''' Wipe that look off your face! Why are you pausing? Will pausing grow your muscles!?
:'''Tecoma:''' Listen up, fresh meat, you need to learn from Coach [[Iansan]], every second of every day. Faster! Stronger! Musclier!
:'''Chayohtli:''' Y&mdash;Yes, Coach! Muscles!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Tacoma'' derives from the {{w|Nahuatl}} word ''Tecomaxochitl'' and was used in pre-hispanic Mexico to name tubular flowers. This word, is also used to name the ''{{w|Tecoma}}'' plant.
* His name, could also be derived from the {{w|Nahuatl}} word ''{{wt|tecomatl}}''.
